channel.title: Helldivers on Gamefacts

item.title: Helldivers 2 out now on Xbox
item.description: Alongside the launch of Helldivers 2 on Xbox, Arrowhead Game Studios also released a Halo: ODST collaboration which brings new items to unlock for all versions of the game. (/images/helldivers2_odst.jpg)
